description:
Ai and Teko are revisited from Makoto`s and Pikari`s perspectives respectively and reveal a surprising side to their personality.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Himeta Omoi no Koto / Madamada Shiranai Koto
The Story of the Feelings Yet Hidden / The Story of the Things Yet Unknown
秘めた思いのコト / まだまだ知らないコト
